claimMistakenETH().notice: Allows caller to claim ETH they mistakenly deposited.

claimMistakenETHTo(address).notice: Allows caller transfer ETH to an alternate address.

totalMistakenETH().notice: Returns contract's total mistaken ETH balance.

totalRecordedMistakenETH().notice: Returns Total mistaken ETH ever deposited.
